#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n=1,i,s,ans;
	int A[55];
	int t=1;
	while(1)
	{s=0;
	ans=0;
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0)
		break;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{cin>>A[i];
		s=s+A[i];
		}
		s=s/n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(A[i]>s)
			ans = ans + A[i]-s;
			
		}
	cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl;
	printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.",ans);
	cout<<endl;
	t++;
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
